DensityOfHNOP[EUVI_,SZA_,theta_,z_]:=(17.979370507407594*Sec[Degree*SZA]^0.04368726510272559*(1 + 0.7402514737982938*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]])*EUVI^0.32333743945752175)/E^((-300 + z)/(62.7861388154266 - 2.3989378755666664*Log[Sec[Degree*SZA]] + 19.674488777046665*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]] - 4.460839670480092*EUVI + ((40.967510714908016 - 0.36862768056955947*Log[Sec[Degree*SZA]] + 22.63102383078093*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]] - 4.97366558318574*EUVI)*(-300 + z))/300))
